overview: When we gradate the boundaries between two polarized things, the two become smoothly connected. By blurring the various boundaries, we can find complexity, diversity, and richness of information.  ---  Lyrics:  Gradation Gradation  Gradation Gradation  White and black  Smoothly  0 and 1  Slightly  round and square  Gradually  The border between them melts  blend together  Gradation Gradation  Gradation Gradation  blurring the difference between the two  Make the transition more subtle  Smooth out the differences  The middle  increase  Connect  Gradation Gradation  Gradation Gradation
title: GRADATIONs
